description.value: If the lich takes radiant damage, regeneration doesn't function on its next turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

+34 vs Reflex; 3d8+10 necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Lightning

Standard

Ranged 20

+34 vs Reflex; 3d8+10 lightning damage, and the target slides 3 squares and is dazed (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 20

+34 vs Fortitude; 3d10+6 necrotic damage, and the target slides 3 squares and is blinded (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Lightning, Necrotic

Standard

The lich makes lightning bolt and orb of shadow attacks against two different targets

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Gaze, Psychic

Minor, Recharge

Ranged 5

+34 vs Will; 5d10+9 psychic damage and the target is dominated (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Psychic, Teleportation

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 5

+34 vs Reflex; 2d8+10 psychic damage, and the target is teleported 20 feet above any unoccupied space within 20 squares. A creature that falls takes 2d10 damage.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Lightning, Necrotic, Zone

Standard

Area burst 2 within 20

Sustain Minor

+32 vs Fortitude; 3d8+10 lightning and necrotic damage. The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the lich's next turn. The zone is considered difficult terrain. Any creature that starts its turn within the zone takes 20 lightning and necrotic damage. The lich can sustain or dismiss the zone as a minor action.

When the lich is reduced to 0 hit points, its body and possessions crumble into dust, but the lich is not destroyed. It reappears (along with its possessions) in 1d10 days within 1 square of its phylactery, unless the phylactery is also found and destroyed. (The lich's phylactery is hidden in a secret temple in Everlost.)

Encounter ✦ Healing

Standard

The lich spends a healing surge and regains 139 hit points. The lich gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of its next turn.

Encounter

Free

After making an attack that deals lightning damage, the lich deals 3d8 + 10 lightning and thunder damage to every creature in a close blast 3.

system.biography:
HP 556; Bloodied 278 ; see also indestructible, second wind
Regeneration 15 (if the lich takes radiant damage, regeneration doesn"t function on its next turn)
Resist 15 necrotic Immune disease, poison 		Init +21 | AP 1 | Save +2
AC 44Fort 42Ref 43Will 41 ; see also second wind
Speed 8
Ability ScoresStr 21 (+20)
Con 30 (+25)		Dex 22 (+21)
Int 33 (+26)		Wis 25 (+22)
Cha 28 (+24)
Languages Abyssal, Common, Draconic, Supernal
Alignment Chaotic Evil
Skills Arcana +31, History +31, Insight +29Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 32 | Insight 39

Equipment staff of storms

Standard
